content.text: Hi, my name is John. I play jazz piano in a band. What do you do for fun?
Hi, I'm Mary. My wife is a hairdresser and I love to play basketball. What's your favorite type of music?
I love jazz music. I play piano in a jazz band. Do you like hiking?
I love hiking! I go hiking with my wife and our dog every weekend. What type of beer do you like?
I love Coors beer. It's my favorite. What's your favorite color?
My favorite color is blue. I love the ocean and the sky. What's your favorite food?
I love sushi. I could eat it every day. What's your favorite animal?
My favorite animal is a cat. I love their independence and their love of naps.
I love cats too! They're so cute and cuddly. What's your favorite book?
My favorite book is The Great Gatsby. I love the story and the characters.
I've never read The Great Gatsby. I'll have to check it out. What's your favorite movie?
My favorite movie is The Princess Bride. I love the humor and the romance.
I've seen The Princess Bride. It's a great movie! What's your favorite TV show?
My favorite TV show is The Office. I love the characters and the humor.
I've seen The Office too. It's a great show! I love Michael Scott.
Me too! Michael Scott is the best!
